description: Scaffolding services for Department of National Defence
full_summary:
### Government Tender Notice

#### Contract Opportunity: Scaffolding Services for Canadian Department of National Defence

The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of National Defence invites offers from qualified suppliers to provide scaffolding services for the maintenance and repair of Canadian naval vessels at Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott in the Halifax area.

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference:** WS4252528705-Doc4355668374
* **Publication Date:** December 19, 2023
* **Closing Date:** January 18, 2024 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 29, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** November 29, 2024

#### Supply Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires scaffolding services for the maintenance and repair of naval vessels, including engineered drawings and certificates. The services include the provision of necessary tools, equipment, and materials. The contract is a Request for Standing Offer (RSO), with a sole evaluation criterion of lowest price.

#### Eligibility

The tender is open to all qualified bidders who can meet the requirements specified in the tender documentation.-appendix ("_U").

#### Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries related to this tender, please contact:

Brian Secord, Department of Public Works and Government Services
Email: [brian.secord@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brian.secord@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Evaluation

The tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) between Canada and the European Union. Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Contribancy Agreement Canada-UK) are some of the agreements implemented.
